name: Cities of the Sun
description:
Make repairs and keep your machine fueled as you speed along the post-apocalyptic badlands.

"Come ride the road that links the cities of the sun. It's the Tucumcari, Albuquerque, Flagstaff, Phoenix run."

                                    - Leslie Fish "Cities of the Sun"

Created for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 (2020)

Theme: "Take Care"

Challenge: "Extra Retro" using the CGA Palette 0 (Low)
